title: Scenario - Scores - Before 10am Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed
and has Widget added
custom_steps: When a user is viewing the Widget before the 10am Scoreboard flip

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the Favorite Team's previous day's game with the following:

Day of the week, Month, Date (Wednesday, Sept 21)
Away team (logo, name, record, score) over Home team (logo, name, record, score)
Game State (Final)

Then the user will see the first game on the MLB previous day's schedule with the following:

Day of the week, Month, Date (Wednesday, Sept 21)
Away team (logo, name, record, score) over Home team (logo, name, record, score)
Game State (Final)
